label: F-Pnm Rothschild 2973 (Chansonnier Cordiforme; Chansonnier de Jean de Montchenu)

metadata.label: Shelfmark
metadata.value: F-Pnm Rothschild 2973 (Chansonnier Cordiforme; Chansonnier de Jean de Montchenu)

metadata.label: Repository
metadata.value: Bibliothèque nationale de France, Département des Manuscrits

description: In shape of a single heart when book is closed and of two joined hearts when book is open. Copied by a single scribe. Copied in Savoy; compiled for Jean de Montchenu, a soldier and priest (later Bishop of Viviers) serving as Vicar-General and Councillor to Jean-Louis de Savoie, Bishop of Geneva. Subsequently owned by 'Pucci,' a Maltese nobleman. Listed in 19th-century library catalogues of Chédeau and Baron Jérôme Pichon (PicotC). Later acquired by the Paris banker Nathan James Edouard, Baron de Rothschild (1844-81), whose library went to his son Henri; passed to Bibliothèque Nationale in 1933.

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: 'O rosa bella, o Deitatis cella (= O quam suavis est domina)'

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: "Morte mercé  - 1a pars (of 2): Morte mercé gentile aquil'altera"

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: "Morte mercé  - 2a pars (of 2): Amor con l'arco tesso"

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: "S'il vous plaist que vostre je soye"

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: "L'aultre jour, par un matin esbatre m'en aloye"

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: 'De tous biens plaine est ma maîtresse [= Cum defecerint ligna]'

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: "J'ai mains de biens - 1a pars (of 2): J'ai mains de biens que s'il n'en estoit nuls = O mira circa nos"

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: "J'ai mains de biens - 2a pars (of 2): [chanson text] = O felix culpa"

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: 'Le souvenir de vous me tue mon seul bien'

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: 'Fortune par ta cruaulte = Sancte speculum trinitatis'

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: 'Ma bouche rit et ma pensée pleure'

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: 'Ma bouche plaint les pleurs de ma pensee'

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: 'Je ne vis oncques la pareille de vous'
